title: Garen raging and screaming the whole game
body:
Constantly calling me "bronzie" (9/1 ???????????) and screaming at his team for being bad and for me being bad, calling me mad (just saying "shhhhh" and "well they ARE level 3" (etc) the whole game ??????????) 

Annoying during the game, funny after. 

http://imgur.com/wUexzNh
